name: Zorgapol
description:
3rd year of university Final project

University: ESTG - Escola Superior de Tecnologia e Gestão

Zorgapol is a sci-fi themed 3D single-player, first-person shooter

game with zombies. It has minimal HUD and takes place in a distant future inside
a laboratory. The player character is a female young adult, Winter, who is
trapped inside Dr. Rorty’s laboratory, her dad. The lab is replete with
zombies, the Nozobs, and she must find a way to evade them with the help
of her dad, who communicates with her via a smart bracelet throughout the
game. She carries an upgradable handgun and a healing device implanted
in her arm, and can find healing edibles, utility gadgets and/or melees,
which are spread across the level.

Platform: PC
Engine: Unreal Engine
Mode: Single-Player
Game Programming: Wilson Santos
Game Art: Bernardo Mónico, Hugo Silva
